Setting.Name: contactNotes
Setting.Value: Tap the button above to choose the contact record of your CSO.

Setting.Name: SiggyNotes
Setting.Value: Signature only included on emailed reports. Its left off of SMS reports.

Setting.Name: PrivacyPolicy
Setting.Value: Privacy Policy: This app uses location services to find your address when entering a new return visit. While the address you enter is stored, the GPS location data recorded while searching for an address is never stored or transmitted.

Setting.Name: AddCallPlacementsHdr
Setting.Value: If set to 'on' placements recorded on a return visit call will count towards your monthly report. If you set this to 'off' you will have to enter your placements twice (on the call and on the add time screen).

Setting.Name: deleteCallsNote
Setting.Value: NOTE: Deleting the calls will delete the RVs from your service report.
